metadata.title: Thursday, 31st October, 2024
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the Old Mkushi Bridge in Mkushi South Parliamentary Constituency will be completed; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is.
(a) what criteria are used in the allocation of grants to public schools, countrywide; and
(b) what measures are being taken to ensure that the funds are utilized prudently.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) how much money the Government released towards Phase II of the Nkana Water Supply and Sanitation Project, as of April, 2024, in the following districts:
(i) Kalulushi; and (ii) Kitwe;
(b) what the scope of works to be covered in Kamfinsa Parliamentary Constituency, from the released funds, is;
(c) when the remaining funds will be released for the completion of the project; and
(d) when the project will be completed.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to consolidate all the parts of the Constitution into a single document;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Energy when the following infrastructure in Nyimba Parliamentary Constituency will be electrified
parts: (a) Hofmeyr RCZ Mission; (f) Mukapela Clinic;
(b) Hofmeyr Clinic; (g) Chimpanji Clinic;
(c) Chiweza Primary School; (h) Kanyena Primary School; and
(d) Mombe Primary School; (i) Nsangano Primary School.
(e) Hofmeyr Secondary School;

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) how many licences, under the following categories, were issued in Luangwa District, as of April, 2024:
(i) large scale mining; (ii) small scale mining; (iii) artisanal mining; and (iv) exploration; and
(b) how many licences in each category at (a) were:
(i) operational, as of May, 2024; and (ii) issued to Zambian led companies.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a bus terminus in the Kitwe Central Business District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) what other minerals, apart from manganese, are found in Mkushi District;
(b) what measures are being taken to exploit the minerals at (a) in order to widen the economic base of the District; and
(c) when mining activities for the other minerals are expected to commence.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct dams in the following areas of Pemba District:
(i) Bweliyale in Yotam Muleya Ward; (ii) Haboombe in Kauba Ward; (iii) Cheelo in Muzoka Ward; (iv) Chibidze in Maambo Ward;
(v) Mulamfu in Nachibanga Ward; (vi) Kaanza in Kasiya Ward; and (vii) Vwulamino in Kasiya Ward;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Education what measures are being taken to address the escalating cases of sexual harassment against female students perpetuated by male lecturers in colleges and universities, countrywide.

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to recapitalise Zambia Railways Limited;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when construction of the District Administration offices in Kanchibiya District will commence;
(b) what the estimated cost of the project is;
(c) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is; and
(d) what the short-term plans for office space for operations of essential Government services are. ___________________________
